text: The Horde will endure!
author: Thrall

text: I will not be denied.
author: Arthas Menethil

text: For the Dark Lady!
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: The tides guide us.
author: Jaina Proudmoore

text: You are not prepared!
author: Illidan Stormrage

text: Lok'tar Ogar!
author: Various Orcs

text: May your blades never dull.
author: Varok Saurfang

text: The Light will heal.
author: Velen

text: My hammer will crush you!
author: Magni Bronzebeard

text: Glory to the Sin'dorei!
author: Lor'themar Theron

text: Times change, and so must we.
author: Garrosh Hellscream

text: Victory or death!
author: Varok Saurfang

text: The Light will guide us.
author: Uther the Lightbringer

text: In the Light, we are one.
author: Prophet Velen

text: Strength and honor.
author: Orcs

text: Our time is now.
author: Grommash Hellscream

text: Darkness called... But I was on the phone, so I missed it. I tried to *69-Darkness, but his machine picked up. I yelled 'Pick up the phone, Darkness!,' but he ignored me.
author: Warden Haro

text: I am forsaken.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: For the Alliance!
author: Varian Wrynn

text: For the Horde!
author: Thrall

text: Times change, and so must I.
author: Anduin Wrynn

text: No king rules forever, my son.
author: King Terenas Menethil II

text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: May your faith guide you.
author: Tirion Fordring

text: Azeroth must not fall.
author: Khadgar

text: We are the Forsaken. We will slaughter anyone who stands in our way.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: We are the blades of Azeroth.
author: Artanis

text: Trust in the Light, and all is possible.
author: Prophet Velen

text: Death is the ultimate equalizer.
author: Cairne Bloodhoof

text: Stay a while and listen.
author: Deckard Cain

text: You are a pawn of forces unseen.
author: Medivh

text: No sacrifice is too great.
author: Illidan Stormrage

text: The future is unwritten.
author: Chen Stormstout

text: Hellscream's eyes are upon you.
author: Grommash Hellscream

text: May the eternal sun shine upon thee.
author: Uther the Lightbringer

text: We will never be slaves.
author: Tyrande Whisperwind

text: Power is not to be given, it is to be taken.
author: Gul'dan

text: All I ever wanted... was a future.
author: Arthas Menethil

text: War is the crucible of heroes.
author: Cairne Bloodhoof

text: There is no good. No evil. No light. There is only power.
author: Illidan Stormrage

text: What are we, if not slaves to this torment?
author: Jaina Proudmoore

text: I see only darkness before me.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: Strength is born in the deep silence of long-suffering hearts.
author: Cairne Bloodhoof

text: May the stars guide you.
author: Prophet Velen

text: I serve the goddess of the Moon. You will not stop me.
author: Tyrande Whisperwind

text: For the fallen.
author: Uther the Lightbringer

text: By fire be purged!
author: Ragnaros

text: You are not the master of your fears.
author: Varian Wrynn

text: I am the lucid dream.
author: Ysera

text: You are not prepared!
author: Illidan Stormrage

text: Enough! Your arrogance will be your undoing!
author: Kael'thas Sunstrider

text: I am the beginning of the end, the shadow which blots out the sun, the bell which tolls your doom.
author: C'Thun

text: I see you...
author: Kil'jaeden

text: Face the wrath of the Soulflayer!
author: Hakkar the Soulflayer

text: All realities, all dimensions are open to me!
author: Kil'jaeden

text: Ashes to ashes...
author: Kel'Thuzad

text: You face not Malchezaar alone, but the legions I command!
author: Prince Malchezaar

text: Your heart will explode.
author: Nefarian

text: I... am... a god!
author: Yogg-Saron

text: You face not the servants of the Light, but the agents of the apocalypse!
author: Highlord Mograine

text: Foolish mortals, you thought you could defeat the Legion?
author: Archimonde

text: Embrace the inevitable, for all mortals must die!
author: Lich King

text: I will feast on your bones!
author: Ragnaros

text: Gaze into the abyss!
author: C'Thun

text: The shadows will envelop you...
author: Mannoroth

text: You are insects in the eyes of a god!
author: Kil'jaeden

text: Too soon! You have awakened me too soon, Executus!
author: Ragnaros

text: The Light shall bring victory!
author: Tirion Fordring

text: Witness the true power of Azeroth!
author: N'Zoth

text: You speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave... and the true meaning of fear.
author: Arthas Menethil

text: Life is pain. Hope fails. Now you understand.
author: Queen Azshara

text: I am nature's fury!
author: Cenarius

text: Let none survive!
author: Kil'jaeden

text: Minions, servants, soldiers of the cold dark! Obey the call of Kel'Thuzad!
author: Kel'Thuzad

text: I am the lucid dream. The monster in your nightmares. The fiend of a thousand faces.
author: Yogg-Saron

text: You are a pawn of forces unseen.
author: Kael'thas Sunstrider

text: Suffer, mortals, as your pathetic magic betrays you!
author: Kil'jaeden

text: I will not shatter. Not like this...
author: Deathwing

text: It is not yet your time to serve the master.
author: C'Thun

text: The waking world will suffer for this affront.
author: N'Zoth

text: Your resilience is admirable. Perhaps I will raise you after all.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: Your light is extinguished.
author: Archimonde

text: Your fate is sealed.
author: Kil'jaeden

text: We are the Forsaken. We will slaughter anyone who stands in our way.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner

text: The very darkness itself shall bow to my command.
author: Ner'zhul

text: In the end, death claims us all.
author: Sylvanas Windrunner
